metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22119 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Spring Security versions 5.5.x prior to 5.5.1, 5.4.x prior to 5.4.7, 5.3.xprior to 5.3.10 and 5.2.x prior to 5.2.11 are susceptible to aDenial-of-Service (DoS) attack via the initiation of the AuthorizationRequest in an OAuth 2.0 Client Web and WebFlux application. A malicioususer or attacker can send multiple requests initiating the AuthorizationRequest for the Authorization Code Grant, which has the potential ofexhausting system resources using a single session or multiple sessions.

criterions.comment: libspring-security-2.0-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
